subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The crew chief Richard Labbe, who is known as Slugger, was suspended for four races and fined $25,000 yesterday for using an illegal part on Dale Jarrett's car at Richmond International Raceway. Nascar officials discovered that the sway bar on Jarrett's car was illegally mounted when the No. 88 Ford passed through Saturday night's prerace inspection in Richmond, Va. The car owner Robert Yates said the violation was not intentional.
